Biography

2023: Appeared in six games on the offensive line, including two starts at Maryland (9/2) and vs. Norfolk State (9/23) at right guard... Towson game captain in win at Morgan State (9/16).

2022: Played in five games as a reserve offensive lineman.

BEFORE TOWSON: Graduate of Lafayette College, where he earned his degree in anthropology and sociology ... Starter in seven games at left tackle for the Leopards as a senior ... started two games at left tackle in 2020 season which was cut short by Covid ... appeared in ten games in 2019 season with two starts ... also started on PAT team ... did not play in freshman year.

HIGH SCHOOL: Started for two years at right tackle for the Lions of Tallwood High ... earned second team all-district honors ... also played four years of basketball in high school.

PERSONAL: Son of Winfred and Gail Roberts ... parents are both graduates of Norfolk State ... has one brother and one sister ... born in Virginia Beach, Va. ... has been involved in community service projects like feeding the poor and reading to elementary school students.
